services.title: Lead Generation Engineering
services.shortDescription: Strategic lead generation using AI-powered tools and data-driven approaches to maximize conversion rates.

fullContent.overview: Transform your business growth with cutting-edge lead generation strategies powered by AI and data analytics. I help businesses identify, attract, and convert high-quality leads through systematic and scalable processes.

process.description: Deep dive into your target market, competitors, and ideal customer profile
Create customized lead generation strategy aligned with business goals
Set up tools, campaigns, and automation systems
Continuous monitoring and improvement of conversion rates

services.title: POC Development
services.shortDescription: Rapid proof-of-concept development to validate ideas and demonstrate technical feasibility.

fullContent.overview: Bring your ideas to life quickly with professionally developed proof-of-concepts. I specialize in rapid prototyping that validates technical feasibility, demonstrates core functionality, and provides clear path to production.

process.description: Understand core functionality and success criteria
Architecture planning and technology stack selection
Build functional prototype focusing on core features
Present working POC and gather insights for next steps

services.title: AI/ML Solutions
services.shortDescription: Custom AI and machine learning solutions tailored to your business needs using latest LLMs.

fullContent.overview: Harness the power of artificial intelligence to solve complex business problems. I develop custom AI solutions using state-of-the-art language models, machine learning algorithms, and intelligent automation.

process.description: Identify specific business challenges AI can solve
Select appropriate AI models and architecture
Build and fine-tune AI models for your use case
Seamlessly integrate AI into existing systems

services.title: Vibe Coding
services.shortDescription: Creative and intuitive coding solutions that balance aesthetics with functionality.

fullContent.overview: Create stunning, user-friendly applications that not only work flawlessly but feel delightful to use. Vibe Coding combines technical excellence with creative design thinking.

process.description: Understand brand, users, and design preferences
Create interactive mockups and design systems
Build with modern frameworks and best practices
Refine details and deploy to production

services.title: Technical Presentations
services.shortDescription: Clear, engaging technical presentations that make complex concepts accessible to all stakeholders.

fullContent.overview: Bridge the gap between technical complexity and business understanding. I create compelling presentations that communicate technical concepts clearly to diverse audiences.

process.description: Understand technical level and information needs
Structure information with clarity and logic
Create engaging slides and diagrams
Present confidently and address questions

services.title: Cloud & DevOps
services.shortDescription: Cloud infrastructure setup and DevOps practices for scalable, reliable deployments.

fullContent.overview: Build robust, scalable cloud infrastructure with automated deployment pipelines. I help teams embrace DevOps culture and implement modern cloud-native architectures.

process.description: Analyze current setup and identify improvements
Plan scalable, secure cloud infrastructure
Set up automated testing and deployment
Implement observability and continuous improvement
